name: v2.0528
title: v2 Event related period
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0528 ( Event related period)

designation.value: vor der Mahlzeit (from lat. Ante cibus)

concept.display: before lunch (from lat. ante cibus diurnus)

designation.value: vor dem Mittagessen (from lat. Ante cibus diurnus)

concept.display: before breakfast (from lat. ante cibus matutinus)

designation.value: vor dem Frühstück (from lat. Ante cibus matutinus)

concept.display: before dinner (from lat. ante cibus vespertinus)

designation.value: vor dem Abendessen (from lat. Ante cibus vespertinus)

concept.display: between dinner and the hour of sleep
after lunch (from lat. post cibus diurnus)
after breakfast (from lat. post cibus matutinus)
after dinner (from lat. post cibus vespertinus)
